t: Creature Cups® : Surprise 3D Animals in Your Cup
s: Hidden 3D animals at the bottom of each cup that emerges with every sip! These unique ceramic mugs will delight and surprise. Add a touch of adventure and joy to your morning coffee routine. A fierce T-rex, a chillin' turtle, a mystical dragon and more, there's an animal for everyone!
